title: Seminyak Private Pool Villa Serenity with Butler Service, Daily Breakfast & Daily Cocktails
description:
Discover a peaceful hideaway in paradise at The Seiryu Villas, Bali, where you can immerse yourself in the lush tropical surroundings of your dreamy pool villa. Inspired by Japanese art and ancient philosophy, The Seiryu Villas offer serene living just steps away from the bustling Seminyak Beach. 

Marrying a fusion of Japanese and Balinese elements, this tranquil oasis (named after the word for 'silent dragon'), delivers contemporary elegance and convenience, exclusively for couples. Each villa offers a private swimming pool and dedicated butler service, so you won't need to leave the comfort of your exclusive sanctuary. The blissful onsite day spa is dedicated to your total relaxation, while Bali's balmy evenings are best spent dining poolside, where the team can spoil your senses with an in-villa barbeque dinner or bespoke made-to-order meals (charges apply). For those seeking to unearth the treasures of Seminyak, the villas are perfectly positioned for guests to easily make the most of the area. The famed Eat Street and Potato Head Beach Club are in close reach, along with an eclectic array of modern and traditional boutiques, stalls, restaurants and bars.
offer_address: Jl. Drupadi No.8, Seminyak, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Private Pool Villa Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massage
description:
Enjoy the serenity of a fully self-contained and incredibly luxurious one-bedroom private pool villa at Maca Villas & Spa Bali. Conveniently located between happening Canggu and bustling Seminyak, the intimate resort is set among tropical landscaped gardens with masterfully designed villas that blend traditional Balinese touches with contemporary modern styling. Savour this laidback region at its most extraordinary - begin each morning on the famed surf breaks of Canggu before returning for a sumptuous breakfast, indulge in holistic wellness treatments at the nearby spa and venture to bustling Seminyak as night falls.

Sample the impressive wine and cocktail selection at the onsite Masé Kitchen & Wine Bar, a contemporary fine-dining space that doubles as a kitchen for immersive Balinese cooking classes. A complimentary shuttle stands by to take guests to the nearby SOHAM Wellness Center, featuring a tranquil spa, fully equipped gym, health-conscious café and multiple fitness classes to get your blood flowing.
offer_address: Jl. Lebak Sari No.7 Petitenget, Seminyak, 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Oceanfront Suites with Massages, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Perfectly positioned on the golden sands of Double Six Beach, The Grand Seminyak - formerly known as the Anantara Seminyak - offers one of Bali's prime beachfront locations, with easy access to buzzing beach bars, high-end boutiques and renowned nightlife. After a thoughtful transformation, the resort brings fresh energy and the new Ocean Grand day club, the perfect spot to unwind with uninterrupted ocean vistas.

The glimmering infinity pool is your front-row seat to Bali’s golden hour glow, while the Moonlite Kitchen & Bar rooftop sets the scene for scenic sunest tipples. Tantalise your taste buds with southeast Asian and Mediterranean flavours across two venues, where panoramic terraces, the ocean breeze and freshly caught seafood make for indukgent dining experiences.

Step outside and dive into Bali's heart and soul with nearby temples and emerald rice terraces that will transport you to different world. When relaxation calls, Grand Seminyak Spa answers with treatments that channel ancient Balinese healing rituals - the perfect treat after a day of exploring.
offer_address: Jalan Camplung Tanduk, Jalan Dhyana Pura, Seminyak, Kecamatan Kuta Selatan, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Seminyak Escape with Rooftop Infinity Pool, Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
World-class beaches, buzzing shopping strips and too-good-to-be-true eateries are just a few of the many reasons travellers love Seminyak, and an ultra-stylish stay at TS Suites Seminyak is the best way to experience it all. Step right from the hotel onto vibrant streets lined with colourful boutiques and innovative restaurants or catch the complimentary shuttle to Double Six Beach. The property's contemporary aesthetic features locally inspired touches with Javanese stone and wood details throughout the resort.

This sparkling resort serves up rest and relaxation by day, before coming alive at night. Sit by the 50-metre sky-high infinity pool and sip signature cocktails from the pool bar. Later, enjoy front-row sunset views as the sky transforms from soft pink tones to fiery red hues. The fun continues into the night, with the rooftop entertainment precinct open until 11pm. For a change of scenery, kick back in the Leisure Club and dine on international cuisine.
offer_address: Jalan Nakula No.18, Seminyak, Bali, Indonesia

title: Iconic Seminyak Potato Head Beach Club Studios with Daily Beach Club Access, Gourmet Dining & Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
There’s nowhere else like Potato Head Studios - kissed by Seminyak sunshine, staggeringly soulful and dripping with tropical cool, this achingly stylish, five-star retreat perfectly complements the iconic Potato Head Beach Club, Bali’s undisputed king of good times on golden shores. Whether it’s DJ-spun raves or world-famous waves, this completely sustainable resort has what you crave - savour an archipelago’s worth of authentic Indonesian bites at Kaum, enjoy Bali’s best seafood fine dining at Ijen or head to Jamu Bar for brilliant turmeric-infused sips steeped in sacred tradition.

When you’re ready to explore, Seminyak’s dazzling array of legendary restaurants, bars and nightlife hotspots are just minutes away. Explore countless upscale boutiques and galleries, munch your way through Eat Street or simply walk some of Bali’s most idyllic stretches of beachfront. When you return, Potato Head Studios’ countless pleasures and leisures await - enjoy arak and vinyls at Studio Eksotika, practice yoga under the rising moon or catch Asia's best up-and-coming acts at multi-sensory indulgence palace Headonism.
offer_address: Jl. Petitenget No.51B, Seminyak, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Award-Winning Three-Bedroom Pool Villa Escape by the Beach for up to Six People
description: Treat yourself and five friends to a private villa escape at EDEN The Residence at the Sea, perched a mere 164 feet from the azure Batu Belig Beachfront and a short drive from Potato Head Beach Club, Pura Petitenget Temple, Watercress cafe and more. Your very own private pool villa for six people includes daily continental breakfast, a three-course Indonesian dinner, a 60-minute massage each and return airport transfers.
location_description: EDEN The Residence At The Sea
offer_address: Jl. Batu Belig, Kerobokan Kelod, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Seminyak Luxury Private Pool Villas Minutes from Double Six Beach with Daily Breakfast
description:
A serene haven in the heart of Bali's famed beach district, Aksari Villa Seminyak delivers luxury villas perfect for romantic escapes or soothing stays. Ideally situated within close range of refined restaurants and chic boutiques, Aksari Villa Seminyak offers easy access to Seminyak's hottest attractions. Plunge into your private pool, relish the peace of your tranquil villa and enjoy a blissful spa treatment before heading to one of the many nearby beaches to savour a Seminyak sunset. When night falls, immerse yourself in Bali's legendary nightlife at nearby Potato Head Beach Club or Ku De Ta.

A floating breakfast served in-villa takes your extravagant stay to the next level, as does the option to choose between a two-course a la carte lunch or dinner, also served in-villa, twice during your stay. Aksari Villa Seminyak is Bali the way it is supposed to be. Enjoy the utmost in secluded opulence with romance sewn into every precious detail.
offer_address: Jalan Sunset Road, Gang Baik Baik II No. 8, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Private Jetted Tub Stay with Decadent Dining & Daily Cocktail
description: A collection of 27 private jetted tub and pool villas, Kanishka Villas is superbly located in the heart of Bali’s buzzing Seminyak. Enjoy a five or seven-night stay in a stunning suite and soak up your indulgent inclusions such as daily breakfast, a 60-minute massage each, private in-villa dining, daily sunset cocktails for two, daily afternoon tea plus a complimentary one-way airport transfers.
offer_address: Jalan Kunti I, Gang Mangga No. 8Y, Seminyak, Kuta, Seminyak, Badung, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Family-Friendly Seminyak Stay with Daily Breakfast, Daily Drinks & Kids Club Access
description:
Treat yourself to the escape you deserve at Montigo Resorts, Seminyak, a stylish five-star urban oasis in the heart of one of Bali’s most loved areas. Find your slice of island paradise just steps from Seminyak's must-visit spots, including the legendary Potato Head and Mrs Sippy Bali beach clubs, plus plenty of family-friendly restaurants and attractions.

Spend the day lounging beside the pool or venture to Montigo Spa, where a slew of rejuvenating and revitalising treatments await. There's no shortage of ways to spend your days at the resort, with a 24-hour fitness centre, scooter tours, Canang Sari workshops and more. Little ones will love Tilo Kids Club - and parents can enjoy some much-needed time off! Whatever your type of escape, Montigo Resorts, Seminyak offers something to please travellers of all styles.
offer_address: Jalan Petitenget, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Seminyak Double-Six Beachside Luxury with Indulgent Dining, Massages & Daily Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Spoil your senses with a sublime stay at Double-Six Luxury Hotel, a stunning five-star resort on Bali’s southwest coast, steps from the sparkling Indian Ocean. This tranquil hideaway radiates contemporary cool and feels as inviting as it does luxurious. Beat the heat and plunge into one of the infinity pools that seem to melt into the water's edge, be transported to a new level of bliss at Acqua Perla Spa, or savour tantalising bites at one of the grand onsite restaurants and bars. Later, enjoy front-row sunset views and watch the sky transform from soft pink tones to fiery red hues. The fun continues into the night, with the rooftop bar open until late.

Vibrant nightlife, world-class beaches, buzzing shopping strips and too-good-to-be-true eateries are just a few of the many reasons travellers love Seminyak, and an ultra-stylish stay at Double-Six Luxury Hotel is the best way to experience it all. Step right from the hotel onto the sugar-fine shores of Double Six Beach or head the other way to find a bustling street lined with small boutiques and local restaurants. Plus, the acclaimed Eat Street and Potato Head Beach Club are just a short drive away.
offer_address: Jalan Pantai Legian and Jalan Double Six No.66, Seminyak 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Tropical Seminyak Two- & Three-Bedroom Villa Escape with All-Inclusive Dining, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
These tranquil villas offer an endless opportunity for comfortable relaxation in the heart of Bali’s famous Seminyak. Ideal for families and small groups, take advantage of impeccably designed Balinese-style residences, complete with sparkling private pools, fully equipped kitchens and lounge areas aplenty.

Boasting a quiet and calm locale that feels incredibly private, the resort is also close to Seminyak’s finest attractions, including the vibrant Eat Street, just a 15-minute drive away, and the sands of Petitenget Beach.

Surrounded by thriving tropical gardens, the resort was purpose-built to be a sanctuary for wellness. Treat your mind, body and soul to a moment of respite and relaxation with a treatment at TULA Wellness by The Amala, gain clarity at a yoga class or satiate your retail appetite at The Amala Boutique. Providing health-conscious dishes all day long, indulge in an intimate alfresco dining experience at the resort’s Bamboo Restaurant.
offer_address: Jalan Kunti 108, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Private Pool Villa Bliss with Indulgent Dining and Nightly Drinks
description: Bask in the bliss of a secluded private pool villa located in the fashionable heart of Seminyak, close to the famous Potato Head Beach Club and beautiful Petitenget Beach. Check in to The Kayana and leave your cares behind with indulgent dining including daily breakfast and afternoon tea, dinner every night and a daily cocktail or beer per person. Top off your perfectly pampered escape with a 90-minute massage and 30-minute reflexology treatment per person during your stay, as well as a convenient airport pick-up.
offer_address: Jl. Raya Petitenget, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Live the VIP Lifestyle with 24-Hour Butler Service, Private Jacuzzi, Massages, Cocktails & More
description: Holiday like an A-lister staying the most exclusive division of The Trans Resort Bali, an award-winning resort in the heart of stylish Seminyak. Experience the luxury of staying in a huge 350 sqm private pool villa with 24-hour butler service at your fingertips. Your escape includes daily breakfast, one indulgent dining experience (your choice of an Indonesian buffet or three-course a la carte), a relaxing 30-minute massage each and villa privileges including daily afternoon tea, nightly cocktails and canapes and much more.
location_description: Trans Resort Bali - Trans Villas OLD
offer_address: Jalan Sunset Road, Kerobokan, Kuta Utara, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Sunny Seminyak Stay with Daily Breakfast, Daily Cocktails & One-Way Airport Transfer
description: Experience the vibrant side of life with a lively retreat at Tijili Seminyak, a modern hotel that embodies Bali's artistic essence. Situated in the bustling heart of Seminyak's vibrant shopping and dining scene, this hotel offers an ideal starting point for culinary enthusiasts and style seekers alike. Relax with cocktails amidst gently swaying palms at Kakatua Tropic Lounge or indulge in authentic Indonesian cuisine at nearby eateries and markets. Within walking distance lies Seminyak Beach, famous for its surf spots and lively beachfront clubs, inviting you to immerse yourself in the island's dynamic energy.
offer_address: Jl. Drupadi 9, Seminyak, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Seminyak Moroccan-Inspired Private Pool Villas with Massages & Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience a romantic escape like no other at the luxurious Cyrus Villa Seminyak by iNi Vie Hospitality. Hidden away from the hustle and bustle of Seminyak, this brand-new one-bedroom villa was designed as a complete sanctuary for couples to relax and rejuvenate in spacious luxury. Start your days with an indulgent lie-in from your plush king bed, before enjoying a laid-back breakfast in the warm, Moroccan-inspired interiors or taking a dip in your sparkling private pool. The villa's dedicated staff will go above and beyond to ensure a memorable stay, arranging special surprises such as candlelit dinners by the pool, afternoon tea in the comfort of your villa or lavish floating breakfasts, upon request.

Despite its secluded location, surrounded by swaying palm trees, the villa is within easy reach of Seminyak's best restaurants, bars, cafes, shopping and entertainment. Explore local attractions with ease, including Seminyak's famed Eat Steet, a plethora of premium beach clubs and mesmerising sunsets at nearby Seminyak Beach.
location_description: Cyrus Villa Seminyak by iNi Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jl. Pengipian No.8x, Kerobokan Kelod, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali World-Famous Potato Head Beach Club Studios with Priority Club Access, Gourmet Dining & Beachfront Cocktails
description:
If you're looking to lounge beachside with a cocktail, immerse yourself in Balinese art, dance the night away and wake up to a revitalising jamu, there is just one name you need to know - Potato Head Studios. This new, achingly stylish resort was soft-launched in late 2019, and reopened in July 2021, to complement the world-famous Potato Head Beach Club, the heartbeat of Seminyak. Drop your bags and arrive at this ultra-cool, five-star beachside haven for a hotel experience centred completely around creativity, culture and sustainability.

With restaurants including a farm-to-table, zero-waste concept, several bars, dedicated local gallery space, public rooftop areas, two infinity pools, and an unrivalled location within the Desa Potato Head creative campus - which already features the internationally-renowned Potato Head Beach Club - there is no better place to stay. Music lovers can hit Studio Eksotika to hear the finest records spin, or bask in pure multisensory indulgence at Headonism; creatives can see the circular future of art at Sweet Potato Lab, and those who prefer indulgence can be transported to a new level of relaxation at the onsite spa. For the kids, an environmentally-friendly kids’ club will surely keep them busy. A destination in itself, Potato Head Studios is a radical playground designed to let your imagination take charge.
offer_address: Jl. Petitenget No.51B, Seminyak, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Award-Winning Seminyak Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Bali paradise is redefined at this five-star private pool villa masterpiece. Boasting a sought-after seaside location - and winning Indonesia's 'Best Hotel Interior' at the Global Brand Awards 2024 - this temple-like sanctuary is the ultimate launchpad for both Balinese exploration and relaxation.

No day will look the same with six onsite eateries and bars to tick off, and even the choice of a la carte or buffet breakfast every day. Enjoy back-to-back cocktails at the Cave Pool Lounge, a poolside bar and restaurant. For lunch or dinner, listen to music while feasting on Japanese izakaya favourites at SugarSand or indulge in a comforting bowl of Pho Bo or Tom Yam at Makase.

In between cocktail sips and beachfront dips, work up a sweat at the 24/7 fitness centre, lap up the main swimming pool (or the secret garden pool), and unwind with a tension-melting treatment or massage at the award-winning Sava Spa.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Bali Seminyak Beach, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jl. Camplung Tanduk No. 10, Seminyak, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Award-Winning Seminyak Pool Villa Serenity with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Welcome to Nyuh Bali Villas, your own private slice of Bali paradise discreetly tucked away from the hustle and bustle of Seminyak - yet within easy reach of the area’s restaurants, vibrant nightlife, markets and independent boutiques, full of unique artisan gifts.

Intimate and authentic, Nyuh Bali Villas is home to a collection of villas, with sweeping views of perfectly placed palm trees, private pools and luxurious amenities. While leaving your sumptuous sanctuary is optional, there’s more to explore. Discover true tranquility at the Nyuh Spa, where treatments combine traditional Balinese techniques with modern wellness knowledge. Sample Seminyak's finest at Nyuh Restaurant, which combines high-quality ingredients with global influences, or opt for something a little more relaxed with delicious in-villa dining.
offer_address: Jalan Bali Deli No. 99 Seminyak, Bali, Indonesia

title: Sense Hotel Seminyak - In The Heart Of Seminyak
description: Experience vibrant Seminyak when you spend three nights at Sense Hotel Seminyak - only a short stroll to the region's famous buzzing bars and high-end shopping, and Legian Beach with its famous sunsets. Enjoy daily breakfast, AU $500 resort credit to use on food and beverage purchases or spa treatments and return private airport transfers.
offer_address: Seminyak, Jl. Kayu Jati No.5, Kerobokan Kelod, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Newly Renovated Oasis in the Heart of Seminyak with Three Pools, Massages & Daily Breakfast
description:
Treat yourself to the escape you deserve with this recently renovated tropical oasis in the heart of one of Bali’s most loved areas. Find your slice of island paradise just steps from Seminyak's must-visit spots, including Petitenget Beach, the legendary Potato Head and Mrs Sippy Bali beach club. With two serene pools, a Balinese Spa and multiple gourmet dining options, you may not even want to leave the comfort of the resort. Opt for TADD's Restaurant for lunch with the kids or a relaxing dinner, or try TIIGO Tiki Bar for a bite to eat and a cocktail. For a more elevated dining experience, savour modern Japanese cuisine at Hinotori, where you can also enjoy live cooking demonstrations.

The resort offers a multitude of options beyond sumptuous dining. Take some time to unwind at Montigo Spa, offering anything from traditional Balinese rituals to herbal compress or hot natural stone treatment, or try something different with a yoga class or aqua aerobics. Little ones will love Tilo Kids' Club, while parents can enjoy some much-needed time off. Whatever your travel style, you're sure to find your bliss at Montigo Resorts, Seminyak.
offer_address: Jalan Petitenget, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Tranquil Seminyak Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast & Massages
description:
Discover the charm of Bali with a stay at this peaceful retreat in the heart of Seminyak. Located close to the renowned Potato Head Beach Club and a variety of excellent restaurants, this destination blends tropical comfort with convenience. 

Enjoy villas featuring private pools, rooftop terraces and attentive service. Savour dining experiences from rooftop barbecues to a selection of Asian and European dishes delivered straight to your villa. Unwind with spa treatments or keep active at the mini fitness centre.
offer_address: 469 Jalan Raya Petitenget, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Newly Renovated Seminyak Oasis with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Extended by popular demand: treat yourself to the escape you deserve with this recently renovated tropical oasis in the heart of one of Bali’s most loved areas. Find your slice of paradise just steps from Seminyak’s must-visit spots, including Petitenget Beach, the legendary Potato Head and Mrs Sippy Bali beach club.

With two serene pools, a Balinese Spa and multiple dining options, you may not even want to leave the comfort of the resort. Opt for TADD’s Restaurant for a laid-back lunch, fresh seafood or prime-cut meats, or try TIIGO Tiki Bar for an afternoon snack and cocktail. For a more elevated experience, savour modern Japanese cuisine at Hinotori, where you can enjoy live cooking demonstrations and locally sourced ingredients.

Take some time to unwind at Montigo Spa, offering everything from signature massages to herbal compress and hot natural stone treatments. Continue the tranquillity with a yoga class or aqua aerobics in the sparkling pool. Little ones will love Tilo Kids’ Club, while parents can enjoy some much-needed Balinese bliss.
offer_address: Jalan Petitenget, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Seminyak Private Pool Villas with Balinese Massages, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Samaja Beachside Villas is your own private slice of Bali paradise discreetly tucked away from the hustle and bustle of Seminyak - yet within easy reach of the area’s restaurants, vibrant nightlife, markets, and independent boutiques. It's also just a five-minute taxi from the island's world-famous beach clubs, including Ku De Ta, Potato Head and Mrs Sippy. Intimate and authentic, the serene Samaja Beachside Villas is home to a collection of six villas, featuring sleek modern décor, with tropical gardens and a private pool.

While you might be tempted to never leave your villa, there’s more to explore. Discover true tranquility at Samaja Spa, where treatments combine traditional Balinese techniques with modern wellness knowledge. Sample Seminyak's finest fare at the property's sister restaurants Warung Samaja or Kasava Resto & Bar, which combine Balinese delicacies with global influences, or opt for something a little more relaxed with delicious in-villa dining.
offer_address: Jl. Camplung Tanduk, Gg. Kubu Pesisi, Seminyak, No. 18 Kuta Bali 80361

title: Romantic Bali Pool Villas with Cooking Class, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Slip into ultimate relaxation mode at Maca Villas & Spa Bali, a tropical oasis of private villas perfect for a romantic island vacation. Experience Bali leisure like never before in your secluded villa with your own personal butler on request, private pool and exceptional facilities. Only minutes away from the calm Petitenget Beach, the stunning villa is perfectly positioned with the glittering nightlife, stylish bars, vibrant markets and diverse restaurants of Seminyak just moments away.

Sample the impressive wine and cocktail selection at Masé Kitchen and Bar, the contemporary fine-dining space that doubles as a kitchen for immersive Balinese cooking classes. Take full advantage of the nearby SOHAM Wellness Centre, featuring a tranquil spa, fully equipped gym, health-conscious café, and multiple fitness classes to get your blood flowing. The resort is also home to Ippolito, a specialty roastery and café, the perfect place to indulge in your morning brew.
offer_address: Jl. Lebak Sari No.7 Petitenget, Seminyak, 80361, Indonesia

title: Seminyak Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description: Experience one of Bali’s most popular destinations from the secluded splendour of your own private pool villa at the boutique Maharaja Villas Bali - a serene hideaway located moments from the action of Seminyak. With a perfect blend of beachfront beauty, boutique shops, sumptuous restaurants and vibrant nightlife, Seminyak is the perfect place to immerse yourself in Bali's unique energy. When you need to recharge, plunge into your villa's very own private pool, unwind with a book on a sun lounger in your tranquil garden space, head to the onsite spa for a treatment or two, or dine at Kayumanis Restaurant while taking in the views of the surrounding rice fields.
offer_address: Jalan Raya Pengubengan No. 168, Banjar Pengubengan Kauh 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Relax in Your Own Townhouse-Style Villa with Daily Meals, Massages & More
description: Swap city life for barefoot bliss in a stylish townhouse villa with a private plunge pool villa at Uppala Villas Seminyak, nestled in a serene location close to all the attractions of Seminyak. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, nightly three-course dinner, daily afternoon tea, a relaxing 60-minute Balinese massage each, return airport transfers and handy late checkout at 1pm.
offer_address: Jalan Intan Permai No.18, Kerobokan, Pengubengan Kangin, Seminyak, Kuta, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Seminyak Chic Apartment & Villa Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Experience the laidback charm of Bali's Seminyak region with a stylish apartment and villa stay just steps from many of the island's most popular restaurants, cafes and boutiques. This family-friendly slice of Balinese paradise is the perfect place for those who want to slow down and relax in the sun.

Spend your days lounging beneath the tropical foliage, floating through crystal-clear pool waters and enjoying the island's best. Seminyak is yours to explore from this stylish base: savour traditional Balinese cuisine at the onsite Groove restaurant or venture out to explore the local eateries.

Enjoy glamorous sun-soaked days at beloved beach clubs Ku De Ta, Tropical Temptation Beach Club, La Favela or Potato Head, and indulge in delicious food at Bali's favourite restaurants and nightspots, including Motel Mexicola, Barbacoa and Sarong Bali.
offer_address: 28 Jalan Drupadi, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Tranquil Seminyak Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Luxury private pool villas await in the vibrant heart of Seminyak, with The Kayana Seminyak Bali a sanctuary of tranquillity. Nestled within a stone's throw of Seminyak's premier dining venues and stylish retail outlets, the villas offer unparalleled access to the area's lively culinary and shopping scene. This boutique haven offers just 24 private plunge pool villas, each a sheltered oasis set within lush tropical gardens. 

Spacious outdoor living and dining areas, pristine natural surroundings and contemporary interiors make for a luxurious home away from home, with discreet service meaning you won't have to lift a finger. Should you be able to pull yourself away from your sun lounge, you'll be rewarded: discover authentic Balinese cuisine at the onsite The Dauh Restaurant, or unwind with a traditional massage at Ayur Spa.

Venture out to explore the eclectic boutiques, chic cafes and fine-dining restaurants of Seminyak, or immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage of nearby temples. Being moments from the Seminyak area, visiting the much-loved Potato Head Beach Club, Merah Putih restaurant, Kynd Community vegan cafe, or the ultra-pink Moroccan-style Bodyworks Spa couldn't be easier.
offer_address: Jl. Raya Petitenget, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Urban-Chic Seminyak Stay near Famous Beach Clubs with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Cocktails
description:
Prime in the pumping heart of Seminyak, Viva Dash Hotel offers guests a vibrant, boutique-style stay paired with exceptional, friendly service. Boasting a modern, colourfully-designed atmosphere with pop-art wall murals at every turn, this urban-chic hotel is perfect for those seeking a fun and fashionable hideaway. Visit Azul Rooftop's bar for crisp cocktails and panoramic views or pop into the funky C'est La VIE Restaurant & Bar, the hotel's signature ground-floor eatery.

Take advantage of Viva Dash Hotess' shady outdoor pool or lounge around on the colourful, plush beanbags and daybeds. Looking to truly unwind? Prioritise your health and wellness by visiting the massage therapy and spa rooms for the ultimate tranquil pampering. Boasting brilliant concierges, readily available to assist you with the best local recommendations or to book you in for a range of daytrips and adventures, Viva Dash Hotel is here to make all your Bali holiday dreams a reality.
offer_address: 148 Jalan Petitenget, Kerobokan Kelod, Seminyak, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali, 80361, Indonesia'

title: Grand Opening: Bali's First-Ever Grand Mercure Seminyak with Gourmet Dining, Deluxe Transfers & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Boasting tropical elegance at its finest, be one of the first to experience the brand-new Grand Mercure Bali Seminyak, nestled only a short stroll from the iconic and vibrant sands of Double Six Beach. Enjoy long walks along the sand or wander around the lively district of Seminyak, famed for its eclectic mix of fashionable boutiques, award-winning bars and restaurants, relaxed cafes and thought-provoking galleries just metres from the hotel’s front door.

Dive headfirst into Bali’s laidback lifestyle as you wade through one of the hotel’s three sparkling outdoor pools, then immerse yourself in a rejuvenating treatment at the hotel’s in-house spa, offering tailored facial, body and skin rituals. Meanwhile, little ones can happily entertain themselves in the kid’s club as adults sip craft cocktails and chilled beers at the Lagoon Pool Bar. From sunrise to late evening, dine on delectable international fare and remarkable, traditional Balinese dishes at Batur All-Day Dining Restaurant while admiring the elegant interiors that look out onto the glistening mirror surface of the hotel’s pool.
offer_address: 40 Jalan Arjuna, Seminyak, Kecamatan Kuta, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: Sana Vie Villa Seminyak by Ini Vie Hospitality
title: Secluded Seminyak Villas with Floating Breakfast, Daily Drinks & Private Pool
description: Find yourself in a romantic haven on the cusp of vibrant Seminyak with a tropical escape to Sana Vie Villa. Expertly designed to blend modern Balinese and Japanese aesthetics, every detail of these spacious one-bedroom villas is expertly considered with comfort and enjoyment in mind. Treat yourself to an enticing floating breakfast in your private pool, and chill out to your favourite tunes with a state-of-the-art voice-command system. At the heart of the hotel’s boutique offerings lies Hiiragi Restaurant - an oasis of culinary greatness combining traditional Japanese techniques with Peruvian flavours to create a novel dining experience. Dine on casual dishes from sunrise to sunset, and as the day turns to night, tuck into rich and complex dishes alongside palate-cleansing cocktails.

Savour this laidback region at its most extraordinary - begin each morning taking in Petitenget Beach via the complimentary shuttle, before returning for a sumptuous breakfast, or venture into bustling Seminyak as night falls. After exploring all the region has to offer, retreat home to the many beautiful spaces throughout the resort's palm-lined surrounds, including three sparkling pools. The opulent Peppers brand is world-famous for providing guests with plush accommodation, first-class facilities and personalised service, and this boutique Seminyak property is no exception. Home to just 52 elegant private pool villas, a state-of-the-art fitness centre, a luxurious day spa featuring a relaxing sauna and ice bath, plus a fine dining restaurant, this five-star resort invites you to leave it all behind and relax in the privacy of your villa.

Each meticulously appointed villa exudes Balinese-inspired charm and sophistication, featuring a private pool, spacious open-plan living area to escape the heat, a generously sized indoor-outdoor marble bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen.

Perfectly positioned within walking distance of the world-class dining and nightlife of Bali’s most beloved beachside district. Wake every morning with sweeping, unrestricted views of the shimmering Indian Ocean, this elegant tropical hideaway features an abundance of lush, sun-kissed terraces, wellness-led dining and spa rituals and dreamy sunset spots - all backed by the resort’s powerful commitment to sustainability. Indulge in ancient restorative treatments at acclaimed wellness sanctuary Spa Alila, splash your way across the resort's four magnificent pools or savour wild-caught seafood at beachside fusion eatery Seasalt. 

While the resort's world-class oceanfront dining and dreamy glistening pools make it difficult to tear yourself away from the serenity, the surrounding wonders reward those who choose to explore. With no better gateway to discovering Seminyak’s stylish centre, you can dine your way through Eat Street’s legendary restaurants, hang ten on the beach’s world-famous waves, toast to your stay at the beloved Potato Head Beach Club and explore countless boutiques and galleries. Back at the resort, little ones are taken care of at Ailia Kids while parents retreat to the Beach Bar for cocktails, ice-cold beers and some of Bali’s most spectacular sunsets.

Surrounded by designer boutiques, remarkable restaurants and beachside bars, this five-star resort is just minutes from all the action but remains a tranquil escape thanks to its extensive grounds and luxurious facilities.

The oversized rooms and suites suggest space and serenity, with outdoor jacuzzis and daybeds as standard. Sixteen extravagant villas go that one step further, each with private pools, hot tubs and blissful Balinese gardens. Spend the day lounging on the resort’s very own manmade beach, where Australian sand gives way to the sparkling blue waters of the outdoor pool, or venture to the Trans Spa, where a slew of rejuvenating and revitalising treatments await. Find your Zen with a yoga class, or work up a sweat at the fitness centre, where personal trainers provide individual coaching, and recovery comes in the form of aromatic steam rooms, dry saunas and hot and cold plunge pools. For frazzled families, a comprehensive kids' club allows the little ones to explore their creativity - and parents to enjoy some much-needed time off! Watch the sky turn apricot as the sun dips below the glimmering shoreline as you dine on delicious fare and refreshing drinks at the glorious Sanje Restaurant & Lounge.
offer_address: Jl. Kayu Aya, Seminyak Beach 80361, Seminyak, Bali, Indonesia

title: Romantic Seminyak Retreat at Morocco-Inspired Villas with Private Pool
description: Experience a romantic Bali escape like no other at the luxurious Cyrus Villa Seminyak by iNi Vie Hospitality. Venture out to Seminyak's best restaurants, bars and entertainment, or relax in the total tranquillity of your villa and take a dip in your sparkling private pool, surrounded by warm, Morocco-inspired design. To ensure an unforgettable stay, the villa's dedicated staff can arrange a number of surprises such as candlelit dinners and a lavish floating breakfast (charges may apply).
location_description: Cyrus Villa Seminyak by iNi Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jl. Pengipian No.8x, Kerobokan Kelod, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Boutique Bali Pool Villa Escape in the Heart of Seminyak
description:
Nestled on the southwest coast of Bali, near the sandy shores of Petitenget Beach in the heart of vibrant Seminyak, you’ll find the elegant Elysian Boutique Villa Hotel. Designed as a sanctuary for travellers who want to rest, relax and experience Bali, The Elysian is a haven of contemporary private villas, all with private pools and stylish interiors. This unique Balinese village-inspired retreat is also full of beautiful social spaces and idyllically positions guests in the heart of the action.

Surrounded by private gardens and within easy reach of Seminyak's stylish bars, restaurants and shops, this boutique gem is a one-of-a-kind destination where creativity, luxury and tranquillity blissfully merge. Follow the artful timber paths to reach the flower-filled garden, where an impressive pool with spacious cabanas awaits. Let serenity find you at the spa, where you can unwind with your choice of traditional Balinese treatments, or discover local treasures on two wheels with onsite bicycle hire, and afterwards the onsite Rush Bamboo Restaurant will take you on a culinary journey through local and international fare. When you’re ready to unwind in total privacy, The Elysian Boutique Villa Hotel's luxurious villas - brimming with character and traditional interiors - are waiting for you.
offer_address: 18 Saridewi, Seminyak, Kuta, Bali

title: Serene Seminyak Escape with Yoga Studio & Resort Pool
description: Rejuvenate mind, body and soul with an escape to Blue Karma Dijiwa Seminyak - a restorative retreat in the heart of Seminyak. Find yourself at the intersection of luxury and tranquillity as you take advantage of impeccably designed Balinese-style villas, sparkling outdoor pools and sumptuous whole foods. Boasting a quiet and calm locale that feels incredibly private, the resort is also close to Seminyak’s finest attractions, including vibrant Seminyak Square and iconic Double Six Beach.
offer_address: Jalan Raya Seminyak, Gang Bima No.2 Seminyak, Kuta Badung, Bali, Indonesia

title: Bali's First-Ever Grand Mercure Seminyak with Three Outdoor Pools & Spa
description:
Experience the best of Seminyak, nestled only a short stroll from the iconic and vibrant sands of Double Six Beach. Enjoy long walks along the sand or wander around the lively district of Seminyak, famed for its eclectic mix of fashionable boutiques, award-winning bars and restaurants right on your doorstep.

Experience Bali’s relaxed vibe by lounging in one of the hotel’s three outdoor pools, followed by a rejuvenating treatment at the in-house spa. Kids can enjoy the kids' club while adults sip craft cocktails at the Lagoon Pool Bar. From sunrise to evening, savor international and traditional Balinese dishes at Batur, featuring elegant interiors with views of the shimmering pool.
offer_address: Jalan Arjuna No. 40 Seminyak, Kecamatan Kuta, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Tropical Island Retreat Five Minutes from Seminyak Beach
description: Embrace laidback island vibes at Avani Seminyak Bali Resort, the perfect Balinese paradise for sinking into tropical relaxation. While the resort offers seclusion and privacy, just outside its doors, you'll find Bali's bustling Seminyak region with its high-end shopping, sleek bars and mouthwatering eateries. For a spot of wining and dining closer to home, Groove restaurant serves poolside all-day bites, or you can opt for a private, in-villa dining experience for something secluded and special. There's no need to skip your workout with the AvaniFit fitness centre on hand, and for the little ones with energy to burn, there's a fun-filled kids' club with an assortment of activities from cookie baking to dance classes. For golden shorelines and endless sun, Seminyak Beach is just a five-minute drive away.
offer_address: 28 Jalan Drupadi, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Seminyak Beach Glamour with Seven Onsite Restaurants
description: Step out directly onto the beach from Hotel Indigo Bali Seminyak Beach, a five-star resort in the buzzing hub of Seminyak, Bali's most vibrant, sought-after area. There are seven onsite eateries and bars to be wined and dined: order a cocktail at the Cave Pool Lounge, a poolside bar and restaurant, listen to music while feasting on Japanese izakaya favourites at at SugarSand, and sip freshly brewed coffee with a pastry at the Pottery café. In between mealtimes, work up a sweat at the 24/7 fitness centre and various daily resort activities, take a dip in the main swimming pool (or the secret garden pool), or indulge in a spa treatment at Sava Spa.
offer_address: JI. Camplung Tanduk No.10, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Tropical Private Villa Sanctuary with Private Pools Surrounded by Balinese Flora
description: Escape to the tropical sanctuary that is the Eight Palms Villa, a secluded escape in the heart of Bali's Legian region. Enjoy your intimate stay at this decadent retreat, surrounded by the traditional Balinese design and rich flora that defines the island as a sacred place of revitalising relaxation. Relax at the nearby stunning beaches and enjoy unforgettable, colourful sunsets. Enjoy everything that the vibrant island has to offer, before escaping to the tranquility of your intimate hideaway.
location_description: Eight Palms Villa by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jalan Pandawa 8A, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Double-Six Five-Star Luxury on Seminyak Beach
description: Spoil your senses with a sublime stay at Double-Six Luxury Hotel, a stunning five-star resort on Bali’s southwest coast just steps from the sparkling Indian Ocean. This tranquil hideaway radiates contemporary cool - plunge into one of the infinity pools that seem to melt into the water's edge, be transported to a new level of bliss at Acqua Perla Spa, savour tantalising bites at one of the impressive onsite restaurants and bars and catch every legendary Seminyak sunset.
offer_address: No. 66, Double Six Beach Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: Ayona Villa Seminyak by Ini Vie Hospitality
title: Romantic Seminyak Private Pool Villas with Private Rooftop Terraces & Floating Bathtubs
description: Find your slice of Seminyak bliss with an intimate and romantic escape at this oh-so-chic collection of villas, nestled in the island’s most happening neighbourhood. Perfect for couples or honeymooners exploring Bali, every detail of this property is designed to elevate the love - savour a floating breakfast in your private pool, laze the day away in your villa's hammock and enjoy ice-cold beers on your private terrace as the horizon melts away. When you’re ready to explore, Seminyak’s extraordinary collection of brilliant beach clubs, world-class restaurants and upscale boutiques await.
location_description: Ayona Villa Seminyak by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jl. Batu Belig Gg. Bayu No.8, Seminyak, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Urban-Chic Colourful Seminyak Stay near Beach Clubs with Onsite Restaurant, Bars & Swimming Pool
description: In the pumping heart of Seminyak, Viva Dash Hotel offers guests a vibrant, urban-chic stay paired with pop-art wall murals at every turn. Visit Azul Rooftop bar for chilled cocktails and panoramic views or pop into the funky C'est La VIE Restaurant & Bar, the hotel's signature ground-floor eatery. Take advantage of the central outdoor pool for a refreshing dip or prioritise your wellbeing with a visit to the massage therapy and spa rooms for a tranquil pampering session.
offer_address: Jl Petitenget No. 468X, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Romantic Balinese Resort in Seminyak
description: Minutes from Bali’s bustling heart is a place that feels worlds away - Monolocale Resort, whose suites and villas exhibit a blend of art and opulence for an unforgettably serene escape. Sip cocktails under blue skies in the hotel pool, eat your way through Sanctuary’s tantalising Indonesian menu, take a short trip to Petitenget Beach to watch the waves roll in, or spend a day hopping between Bali's world-famous beach clubs and nightlife.
location_description: Monolocale Luxury Resort & Spa Seminyak by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jl. Umalas 1 No.88A, Seminyak, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Adults-Only Five-Star Seminyak Pool Villas
description:
Offering contemporary style and tropical seclusion in the heart of Seminyak, the adults-only One Eleven is the epitome of luxury villa living, with a five-star resort experience. Push back the weighted wooden door to your palatial oasis and find yourself in a secluded, palm-fringed landscape with blissfully manicured lawns and an extravagant private spa gazebo. The villa's most striking feature is its impressive 14-metre private swimming pool that beautifully reflects in the panoramic floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors that mark the entrance to your luxury abode. Step through and discover an effortlessly styled space with ample living areas, a contemporary kitchen, separate light-filled bedroom with a plush king bed dressed in crisp white linens, and a gorgeous ensuite with an indulgent bathtub that faces the sparkling pool.

You'll want for nothing at One Eleven - feel like a VIP with a private butler catering to your every need 24 hours a day, or unwind in your extravagant private spa gazebo overlooking the pool, where One Eleven's expert masseuses can soothe and stretch your body without you ever having to leave your villa. Organise in-villa dining or head to the intimate Shiro restaurant, where exquisite fresh sushi is complemented by an impressive sake selection. When you want to explore, this super-sleek sanctuary's enviable location in the heart of Seminyak allows easy access to boutiques, bars and Bali's hottest beach clubs, including Potato Head and Mrs Sippy.
offer_address: Jl. Pangkung Sari No.3, Kerobokan Kelod, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: KLEO Seminyak (Formerly known Studio at Alila Seminyak)
title: Chic Seminyak Stay near Petitenget Beach with Rooftop Pool & Bar
description:
A tranquil escape awaits at these modern studios nestled in vibrant Seminyak. Just moments from the buzz of Seminyak Square and Eat Street, this stylish retreat blends modern comfort with touches of traditional Balinese charm, offering a peaceful sanctuary after a day of island exploration.

Unwind by the rooftop pool with a cocktail in hand as you take in sweeping views of the Indian Ocean, or indulge in Indonesian cuisine at the onsite restaurant. With iconic landmarks like Potato Head Beach Club and the sacred Petitenget Temple a stone's throw away, you'll find the perfect balance of cultural discovery and nightlife right at your doorstep.
offer_address: Jl. Taman Ganesha Jl. Petitenget No.9, Seminyak, Bali, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Seminyak Beachfront Retreat with Onsite Spa, Three Bars & Restaurants
description: Make your next Bali break the best one yet with a stay at one of Seminyak's most prestigious beachfront resorts, The Oberoi Beach Resort Bali. Perched on the sands of Kaya Aya Beach in the middle of buzzy Seminyak, this five-star escape is perfectly placed for exploring the vibrant Seminyak Square or indulging in world-class dining at the renowned 'Eat Street'. End your day in the resort's opulent spa, catch a traditional dance performance in the natural amphitheatre, or dine under the stars at the Frangipani Cafe.
offer_address: Seminyak Beach, Jl. Kayu Aya, Seminyak, Denpasar 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Seminyak Luxury Villa Stay Minutes from Double Six Beach
description: A serene haven in the heart of Bali's famed beach district, Aksari Villa Seminyak delivers luxury villas perfect for romantic escapes or soothing stays. Ideally situated within close range of refined restaurants and chic boutiques, Aksari delivers easy access to Seminyak's hottest attractions. Plunge into your private pool, relish the peace of your private villa or treat yourself to a blissful spa treatment before heading to one of the many nearby beaches to savour a Seminyak sunset.
offer_address: Jalan Sunset Road, Gang Baik Baik II No. 8, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Alila Seminyak Five-Star Beachfront Suite Stay with Daily Farm-to-Table Breakfast
description:
Offering laidback and sustainable luxury on the iconic shores of Seminyak Beach, Alila Seminyak oozes effortless cool. Enjoy five-star service and uninterrupted ocean views over one of Bali’s most beautiful beaches from the hotel's five swimming pools - including an adults-only and family pool. This award-winning oasis boasts a Travellers' Choice 2020 badge on Tripadvisor and a location in the heart of Seminyak, allowing easy access to Bali's hottest beach clubs, including Potato Head and Mrs Sippy.

Built around a 40-year-old Hindu temple, this ultra-stylish, modern resort features two dining outlets - including the trendy Beach Bar - and the world-class Spa Alila, where guests can enjoy relaxing treatments. The hotel prides itself on staying committed to sustainable tourism, promoting eco-friendly practices and supporting the local community. Head to Seasalt bar for a 'zero-waste' cocktail, a unique opportunity to try a delicious drink that won't cost the Earth.
offer_address: Jalan Taman Ganesha No. 9 Bali Bali 80361 Indonesia

title: Blissful Bali Escape Moments from Seminyak Beach with Lagoon-Style Pool & Onsite Spa
description: Find yourself in the charming Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six, nestled in the heart of Bali's vibrant Seminyak and a stone's throw from Double Six Beach, where sunsets are legendary. Delight in the resort's lagoon-style pool, soothing spa, and picturesque Beach Restaurant offering relaxed dining in paradise. Explore Seminyak's chic boutiques, trendy eateries and thriving nightlife, before retreating for a tasty cocktail at the Sunken Pool Bar and a night of restful slumber.
offer_address: Jalan Camplung Tanduk No.66, Seminyak, Kuta, Badung, 80361, Bali

title: Five-Star Seminyak Retreat with Pool & Spa
description:
Treat yourself to the escape you deserve at Montigo Resorts Seminyak, a stylish five-star urban oasis in the heart of one of Bali’s most loved areas. Find your slice of island paradise just steps from Seminyak's must-visit spots, including the legendary Potato Head and Mrs Sippy beach clubs, plus plenty of family-friendly restaurants and attractions.

Spend the day lounging beside the pool or venture to Montigo Spa, where a slew of rejuvenating and revitalising treatments await. While there's no shortage of ways to spend your days at the resort, if you're looking to travel further afield you can enjoy one of the hotel's scooter tours. Onsite, little ones will love Tilo Kids Club - and parents can enjoy some much-needed time off! Whatever your type of escape, Montigo Resorts Seminyak offers something to please travellers of all styles.
offer_address: Kerobokan Klod 83061, Bali, Indonesia

title: Iconic Seminyak Potato Head Beachfront Retreat with Legendary Beach Club
description: There’s nowhere like Potato Head Suites & Studios - kissed by Seminyak sunshine, staggeringly soulful and dripping with tropical cool, this achingly stylish, five-star retreat perfectly complements the iconic Potato Head Beach Club. Whether it’s DJ-spun raves or world-famous waves, this completely sustainable resort has what you crave - savour Indonesian bites at Kaum, enjoy seafood fine dining at Ijen or head to Jamu Bar for brilliant turmeric-infused sips.
offer_address: Jl. Petitenget No.51B, Seminyak, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Lively Seminyak Escape with Sky-High Infinity Pool
description:
Vibrant nightlife, world-class beaches, buzzing shopping strips and too-good-to-be-true eateries are just a few of the many reasons travellers love Seminyak, and an ultra-stylish stay at TS Suites Seminyak is the best way to experience it all. Step right out of the hotel onto a bustling street lined with boutiques and local restaurants or catch the complimentary shuttle to Double Six Beach just a short ride away.

This lively resort is the place to go for a dose of rest and relaxation by day, before coming alive at night. Sit by the 50-metre sky-high infinity pool and snack away on light bites or grab a cocktail from the pool bar. Later, enjoy a front-row spot to watch the sky transform from soft pink tones to fiery red hues. The fun continues into the night, with the rooftop entertainment precinct open until 11pm. For a change of scenery, drop into the hotel’s very own nightclub, Jenja, or kick back in the TSea Leisure Club and dine on international cuisine.
offer_address: Jalan Nakula No.18, Seminyak, Bali, Indonesia

title: Romantic Seminyak Escape with Private Jacuzzi
description: Take the romance up a notch when you stay at Sini Vie Resort Seminyak by Ini Vie Hospitality, located in the heart of Seminyak, Bali's capital of cool. Take long, leisurely soaks in your private jacuzzi, or pop over to the adjoining Shichirin, renowned for serving up the best breakfast and lunch in Bali. When you're not reveling in the romance of your oasis, head out to explore Seminyak: Eat Street is an easy 15-minute drive away and hosts some of Bali's best restaurants and beach bars.
location_description: Sini Vie Resort by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jalan Dewi Saraswati No.88 A, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Boutique Seminyak Suite & Villa Hideaway with Onsite Restaurant & Tranquil Pool
description:
Surrender to the tropical charms of Bali's chic Seminyak region with a sophisticated stay just steps from many of the island’s most popular restaurants, cafes and boutiques. Cocooned amid lush greenery, this tranquil abode is ideal for families and travellers seeking sunshine and serenity.

Spend your days gliding through the resort's crystal-clear pools or take a leisurely stroll to the nearby Seminyak Beach, famed for its stunning sunsets and world-class surf. Dine on authentic flavours at the onsite Groove restaurant, discover Seminyak’s culinary gems and get a glimpse of the island's vibrant nightlife.
offer_address: 28 Jalan Drupadi, Seminyak, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Secluded Seminyak Bohemian Escape with Tropical Gardens & Resort Pool
description: Experience Blue Karma Village, a hidden bohemian haven of tranquillity, home to 16 carefully curated, private joglos, suites and villas set amongst lush tropical gardens - just 15 minutes from Seminyak. At the heart of the hotel’s boutique offerings lies Hiiragi Restaurant - an oasis of culinary greatness combining traditional Japanese techniques with Peruvian flavours. After exploring all Seminyak has to offer, retreat home to explore the resort's palm-lined surrounds, including the three sparkling pools.
offer_address: Jalan Umalas Klecung, Kerobokan Kelod, Badung Regency, Bali, Indonesia
